title: New: T.O.L.D. – Lucifer's Eyes
body:
**T.**

**O.L.D.** (The Order of Life and Death) has raided Jamie XX’s steel drum storeroom (he definitely has one of those) for his debut track, _Lucifer’s Eyes_. Whilst appearing all sandy beaches and smiles on first listen, further plays reveal a darker, more sinister side to Lucifer’s Eyes, despite it’s initial pop sensibilities. Combining elements of Hurts with the groovier side of recent synth pop successes (St. Lucia, Panama Wedding etc.), it’s a debut that’s sure to garner plenty of attention. [(via DN](http://disconaivete.com/post/97076568676))
